product_name: DeLorme New York Atlas and Gazetteer
long_description: Complete topographic maps of the entire state of New York--details include back roads, backwater lakes and streams and campgrounds. Also covers trailheads, public lands, hunting and fishing spots and more. Map scale is 1:150,000 with a contour interval of 50 meters (164 feet). DeLorme Publishing.
short_description: Complete topographic maps of the entire state of New York--details include back roads, backwater lakes and streams and campgrounds.
